original_text: When a ruler hath sinned, and done somewhat through ignorance against any of the commandments of the Lord his God concerning things which should not be done, and is guilty;
korean_text: 만일 족장이 그의 하나님 여호와의 계명 중 하나라도 부지중에 범하여 허물이 있었는데

sentences.original_text: against any of the commandments of the Lord his God
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 하나님 여호와의 계명 중 어느 것에 반하여

sentences.original_text: concerning things which should not be done
